data.name: Warudo
data.detailed_description:
Warudo is an upcoming 3D avatar animation engine designed for both VTubers and 3D character modelers.

  • 100% free.
  • Supports webcam and ARKit tracking by default, or use any VRC-compatible tracking software.
  • Compatible with VRM and VRChat (*) models. (*Requires an one-time export in Unity)
  • Completely customizable facial expressions based on your model's blendshapes.
  • Use your own 3D environments and props.
  • Native integration with livestreaming platforms, e.g. Twitch, Bilibili.
  • Plugin SDK that allows you to fully customize the data flow logic, add new features, etc.
  • And many, many more!

Models used in the images are NOT included in the release.
Credits: 『ノウル』by ぜれゔぃあ

data.short_description: Warudo is an open 3D VTuber animation engine built with flexibility in mind. Import custom 3D assets, fully-customizable tracking, integration with livestreaming platforms, and many more.
